item.title: R & Python together!
item.description: So why would you ever need to use both Python AND R? Well, they are both widely used languages which contain a large array of tools with different functions. R is a programming language for statistical computing and software whereas Python is a more general-purpose coding language that can be used for a wide variety of programming languages and development. Now, you still might be unfamiliar with Python and wondering what kind of things we can do using the language --- look no further, here is an example!
